errors.description: Content is not scrollable with the keyboard. Long content gets cut off.
errors.fix: Make content of dialog focussable so it can be scrolled via keyboard. Suggestion: Add ad tabindex='0'

errors.description: Provide an accessible label for the select.
errors.fix: Can be done by adding a <mat-label> inside of <mat-form-field>, the aria-label attribute, or the aria-labelledby attribute.

errors.description: If an input error is automatically detected, the item that is in error is identified and the error is described to the user in text.
errors.fix: Error messages can be shown under the form field underline by adding mat-error elements inside the form field. You can associate an error with a text input field using aria-describedby.

errors.description: Provide labels to make it clear what the user should select and optionally provide extra hints to help them avoid errors.
errors.fix: Can be done by adding a <mat-label> inside of <mat-form-field>, the aria-label attribute, or the aria-labelledby attribute.

errors.description: If an input error is automatically detected and suggestions for correction are known, then the suggestions are provided to the user, unless it would jeopardize the security or purpose of the content.
errors.fix: Associate the error message with the field using aria-describedby. You can notify the users about the issue by using ARIA live regions.
